titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The Mothers Union held their annual Festival in the Cathedral, & I preached to them. The women filled the great church, & behaved very well.

body.p: Then I shewed Mr Justice Sankey & his young men – Gwynn & Butler – over the Cathedral.

p.hi: Finally I wrote letters to Mary, Hutton, and Alford.
